title: Data mining and integration with Python
description:
There is an abundance of data in social media sites (Wikipedia,
Facebook, Instagram, etc.) which can be accessed through web APIs. But
how do we know that the data from the Wikipedia article on "Golden Gate
Bridge" goes along with the data from "Golden Gate Bridge" Facebook
page? This represents an important question about integrating data from
various sources.

In this talk, I'll outline important aspects of structured data mining,
integration and entity resolution methods in a scalable system.
